'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. It is located on a island slightly north of the southwestern corner of the map, at the coordinates 28° 46' S 32° 26' E.

==Background==
This is a long-abandoned Huana temple in a remote corner of the Deadfire Archipelago. Infested by lagufaeth and imps, it was recently taken over by one [[Leofwyn]].

==Points of interest==
* This is a small location, with a single main chamber containing Leofwyn and a corridor running around it.

==Characters==
* [[Leofwyn]]

==Loot==
* [[Harmony]]:  Hidden towards the candles (looks like a small purple cloud)
* [[Leofwyn's Grimoire]]
* [[Amira's Wing]]: Hidden in the center table.
